name: stripe-backend
description: Backend minimal pour Stripe avec React Native

scripts.prisma:container: powershell -Command "$cwd = (Get-Location).Path; docker run --rm -it --network stripe-backend_default -v "${cwd}:/usr/src/app" -w /usr/src/app node:18 bash -lc "npm install --no-audit --no-fund; npx prisma generate; npx prisma db push --schema=prisma/schema.prisma; node prisma/seed.js""
